title: Center City + Vicinity | Mekor 3
headings: Get in Touch About Local Kashrut
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Center City & Vicinity Center City​ Main Line Old York Road Cherry Hill​ Get in Touch About Local Kashrut Have questions, updates, or suggestions regarding our list of kosher-certified establishments? Send us a message—we’d love to hear from you! First name Last name Email Phone Subject Question or note Submit Restaurants Bakery & Cafe Ice Cream Last Updated: 2025-11-25 20th Street Pizza ​ Vegan Pizzeria 108 S 20th St 215-398-5748 Under IKC Supervision ​ Bar Bombon ​ 133 S. 18th Street (267) 606-6612 ​Under IKC Supervision ​ Cafe 613 at Temple Hillel ​ College Cafeteria 1441 W Norris St 215 777-9797 ​Under Keystone-K Supervision​ ​ Charlie Was a Sinner. 131 S 13th St, Philadelphia, PA 19107, USA (267) 758-5372 Under IKC Supervision Casa Borinqueña​ ​ 2557 Amber St, Philadelphia, PA 19125, United States (267) 764-5735 Under IKC Supervision​ Dining Commons at Penn Hillel​ Falk ​College Dining Hall 215 S 39th Street (215) 573-7596 Under Keystone-K Supervision Fitz on 4th ​ Vegan Tapas 743 S. 4th St.​ (215) 315-8989 Under IKC Supervision ​ Goldie - Center City 1. ​2101 Pennsylvania Ave, PA 19130 ​​​ 2. ​Midtown Village ​1218 Sansom St. ​​​​​​ 3. 1911 Sansom Street, PA 19102 ​​ 4. Franklin's Table Food Hall 3401 Walnut St. ​​​ Under IKC Supervision​ HipCityVeg - Vegan Fast Casual​​ Locations: 1. 127 S. 18th Street Under IKC Supervision​ ​​​​ 2. 214 S.40th Street​​ ​ Under IKC Supervision​ Joy Cafe ​ 630 N 2nd St Philadelphia, 19123 215-922-1003 Under IKC Supervision​​​​​​​ ​ Kosher Corner​ Temple U. - Morgan Hall - North 1601 N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 215-939-1760 Under Keystone-K Supervision Luhv Vegan Deli ​ Reading Terminal Market 51 N 12th Street, Philadelphia, PA (267) 758-5779 Under IKC Supervision​​ Luhv Vegan Bistro ​ Vegan Fast Casual 1131 S 19th St, Philadelphia, PA (215)-608-1081 Under IKC Supervision​​ Mama's Vegetarian​ ​ 18 S 20th St, Philadelphia, PA 19103, United States 215-751-0477 Keystone-K Kosher Miss Rachel's Pantry ​ Miss Rachel’s Pantry 1938 S Chadwick St Philadelphia, PA 215 821 8478 Under IKC Supervision PS & Co ​ 1706 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19103 ​(215) 985-1706​ Under IKC Supervision Say She Ate Cafe​ ​ 1408 South St, Philadelphia, PA 19146, United States​​ (215) 650 7577​​ Under IKC Supervision Stephen’s Cafe​​ ​ 741 N 23rd St, Philadelphia, PA 19130, United States 267-856-5770​​ Keystone-K Kosher The Brazillan BBQ Mikveh Israel 44N 4th Street Philadelphia 267-769-3155 Under Keystone-K Supervision (Also kosher for pesach)​ The Kosher Grill​​​ ​ Wells Fargo Center 3601 S. Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19148​​ (773) 897-9904​ Under Keystone-K Supervision ​ Unit Su Vege​​​ ​ 2000 Hamilton Street,Unit 106,Philadelphia,PA 19130 215-988-1888 Under IKC Supervision​ ​ Kosher Map Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue
